snippet: Overtime goal scorers in the N.H.L. playoffs come in all shapes, sizes and positions. With more playoff games decided in overtime than ever, there are more diverse heroes than ever.
abstract: Overtime goal scorers in the N.H.L. playoffs come in all shapes, sizes and positions. With more playoff games decided in overtime than ever, there are more diverse heroes than ever.

headline.main: The Overtime Hero Is Anyone's Guess
headline.print_headline: Overtime in the Playoffs Is When Unlikely Stars Show Up
